issue.title: X3 Config 4 (VGA RGBD Camera) has incorrect camera_info calibration matrix

content.raw:
Thanks for looking into it. I found that some of the practice launch files were still using an older version of the x3 config 4 model which does not have the lens intrinsics set yet. I’ve fixed it in pull request #306.

In the mean time, your changes looks good.
content.html:
Thanks for looking into it. I found that some of the practice launch files were still using an older version of the x3 config 4 model which does not have the lens intrinsics set yet. I’ve fixed it in pull request #306.

In the mean time, your changes looks good.
